attributes.additional_details: Fuel is to high government is charging 50p per liter and then 20% vat
attributes.background: Reduce the fuel price as it is hurting small business if not we will take action

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  Prices are a matter for retailers. 

You might like to sign a petition relating to reducing taxes on fuel, such as
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421
